subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Wright and Lucas Duda hit R.B.I. singles in the ninth inning off the Yankees closer Mariano Rivera, who recorded his first blown save of the season in a loss at rainy Citi Field.
snippet: David Wright and Lucas Duda hit R.B.I. singles in the ninth inning off the Yankees closer Mariano Rivera, who recorded his first blown save of the season in a loss at rainy Citi Field.
